title: Sum-to-One Violation Detection
mechanism: Research found that Harris + Trump contracts should sum to $1 but often didn't on Polymarket. 62 of 65 days showed mispricing. In Kalshi multi-outcome markets, can we detect when probabilities don't sum correctly and exploit the gap?

proposed_signal.condition: Sum of YES prices for mutually exclusive outcomes != 100c
proposed_signal.action: Bet on the relatively underpriced outcome

price_proxy_risk: MEDIUM - involves prices but measures structural arbitrage
novelty_vs_tested: H062 tested multi-outcome mispricing but was REJECTED. This focuses specifically on SUM violations
